oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The treatment of only environmental streptococci clinical mastitis cases reduced antibiotic use, days out of the tank, recurrence of clinical mastitis and a tendency to reduce culling
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lago, A.
Tovar, C.
Zaragoza, J.
Luiz, D.
Pearce, D.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: antibiotic
clinical outcomes
streptococci
blanket therapy
treatment
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective was to compare antibiotic use and clinical and bacteriological outcomes for selective treatment of only clinical cases where environmental streptococci were isolated vs blanket therapy.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2016; 144-145
